name: The PR Network
description:
PR. Reborn. The power of communications is redefining the rules of business. We’re taking advantage of the low overheads that virtual working affords, to enable our clients to access a top quality PR agency, based on the world’s leading freelance talent. Cross sector whether you’re launching a new pharmaceutical product or a new ice cream our associates are organised into sector-specific teams with deep subject matter expertise.
We cover everything from b2b and consumer tech through to food and drink, automotive, financial services, environment, government and everything in between.
 
READ MORE...
